CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1959, pg. 1 reads: "Fighting to Live - With severe burns of his entire body, 11-year-old Willie Fletcher, of 127 Third Ave., Braddock, the victim of a disastrous Christmas night fire which killed his father and two brothers and a sister, is fighting to live in Braddock General Hospital. -Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eleven-year-old Willie Fletcher, heavily bandaged from burns, lying in hospital bed in Braddock General Hospital
